data.message: I'm honestly surprised your UK concert didn't get bombed. Not cause I hate you or anything, as you're in my top 3 favorite rappers. Just because they got terrorist attacks over there at least every other week.

replies.message: Its not that bad lol but i was pretty nervous about going to gig in glasgow but we didnt get bombed its all good

Yeah after that Ariana Grande shit, I wouldn't be doing shows there until something got done about all the madness over there. I couldn't have that shit on my conscience if someone died at one of my shows.
Eminem is the bomb
Hmm how can I tell people I do shows
No we dont you spastic
not true at all lol, my guess you watch fox news too often

That's why I keep seeing news articles about stabbings, acid attacks, vehicles being used to run people down, and other atrocities on a near weekly basic? And ah, the good old "Fox News" retort. Don't you have anything original to come at me with, Eden?
Yeah cause America is fuckin safe!
No because she's too busy worrying about being blown up lol
At least our problems aren't caused my mass unvetted immigration while our leaders say terrorist attacks are "part and parcel" of living in a big city 🙄
He's alright in Scotland. Terrorists just get a boot in the baws, even if they're on fire 👍
I mean fuck, y'all had 104 attacks in 2016 alone, and isn't it getting pretty close to that this year? And yeah I haven't heard of shit coming from Scotland. Those motherfuckers are crazy though lmao

Yeah the UK really isn't that bad. And yes we had a few terrorist attacks recently and they were all born in the UK. Not immigrants. And America has shoot ups daily and you worry about coming here!?😂 dumb cunt

"A few terrorist attacks". Son it's been more than a few and every time Allahu Akbar is heard right before the shit goes down. The sad part is, UK police are more concerned with mean words on social media than doing something about the 2,000-3,000 known jihadists living right in their country. Priorities, right?
And the funny thing about our shootings is they mainly happen in democrat/blue states with stricter gun laws. Kinda makes ya think, don't it?
I'm from the UK and you are right man
Think you maybe need to do some research!!
104 terror attacks did you just reach up your ass and pull a number out must be the most secret attacks ever
https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_terrorist_incidents_in_Great_Britain Nah fam, I took five fucking seconds to do a Google search.
Funny how there isn't shoot ups in the UK all the time like there is in AMERICA....Makes you think doesn't it!!!! Lmao
And seriously I live here...I think I know better than a yank. We've had a few over a short period of time
Hey, we got problems, but at least we still got free speech
Your police really have their priorities straight, don't they?

The reason we crack down on things like xenophobia/racism is because 1. It's the right thing to do. 2. It helps reduce terrorism as the hate towards them is what turns a lot of them 3. We wouldn't want to be like America which is full of opinionated fat dickheads (3 is a bit more tongue in cheek...obviously not all Americans but that's all we see)
Not gonna lie I went to his Leeds one and I was scared yanno
